description:
Add a --dry-run flag that shows what changes would be applied when syncing or merging templates without actually modifying files. Display diffs and potential conflicts.

**Rationale:** Users need confidence before applying potentially breaking changes to their development environment. Preview functionality reduces anxiety and prevents accidental overwrites.
title: Dry-run and preview mode for template merging
